attributes.action: enforce a maximum waiting time for home office applications decisions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there a people waiting for over a year to hear weather or not the home office has decided they can live in the uk or not during such time these people cannot work or claim any benefits some have even served in the uk armed forces this within itself is unhumain an a betrayal of the millitary covenant an the home office must be compelled to make decisions within a certain time period had this procedure being in place the immigration back log problems would not have exsisted.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
